title: I got Hacked
body: I stupidly clicked on a link from a LoL friend and it sent me to this free jinx skin. I am completely oblivious to these things so I clicked and it looked identical to the league OCE Home page. So I signed in and next thing i know. my account automatically sent the link to all my league friends. and it now says that someone has logged into my account and kicked me off of it. When i try to change my security details its got some random email on there that isn't mine. So I cant change it. Can anybody please help

replies.body: Thank you so much, im submitting the ticket now as they have changed my password.

the same link got sent to me and the support pages is not helping. wtf 
i keep getting robotic answer and i just want my account back
I wish you luck! Things like that can be really scary... but just remember, if its not from a league event and in client, its not legit and certainly never free D: I hope you get your account back!

Hi TwistedHeart,

The best way to get your account back is to lodge a support ticket for an account recovery.
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

You'll be required to fill out a few questions to confirm your identity but if all goes well you should have your account secured soon.
